name: cheetah
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a wild animal of the cat family, with yellowish-brown fur and black spots, that can run faster than any other animal: Cheetahs are mainly found in Africa.
GlobalP/ iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

Add to word list
Add to word list
a large, wild cat that has yellow-brown fur and black spots and that lives in Africa and south Asia, and is known for its speed
